Rules While Shape-Shifted. While in a form, you retain your personality, memories, and ability to speak, and the following rules apply:

Temporary Hit Points. When you assume a Wild Shape form, you gain a number of Temporary Hit Points equal to your Druid level.

Game Statistics. Your game statistics are replaced by the Beast's stat block, but you retain your creature type; Hit Points; Hit Point Dice; Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores; class features; languages; and feats. You also retain your skill and saving throw proficiencies and use your Proficiency Bonus for them, in addition to gaining the proficiencies of the creature. If a skill or saving throw modifier in the Beast's stat block is higher than yours, use the one in the stat block.

No Spellcasting. You can't cast spells, but shape-shifting doesn't break your Concentration or otherwise interfere with a spell you've already cast.

Objects. Your ability to handle objects is determined by the form's limbs rather than your own. In addition, you choose whether your equipment falls in your space, merges into your new form, or is worn by it. Worn equipment functions as normal, but the DM decides whether it's practical for the new form to wear a piece of equipment based on the creature's size and shape. Your equipment doesn't change size or shape to match the new form, and any equipment that the new form can't wear must either fall to the ground or merge with the form. Equipment that merges with the form has no effect while you're in that form.

Foundry Note

You can activate this feature to track uses of your Wild Shape.

It will automatically restore a use on a Short Rest and all uses on a Long Rest.

Blessed Warrior.name: Blessed Warrior
Blessed Warrior.description: You learn two @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.SkHptN2PTzFGDaEj#cantrip]{Cleric cantrips} of your choice. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGuidance00]{Guidance} and @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplSacredFlam]{Sacred Flame} are recommended. The chosen cantrips count as Paladin spells for you, and Charisma is your spellcasting ability for them. Whenever you gain a Paladin level, you can replace one of these cantrips with another Cleric cantrip.

Druidic Warrior.name: Druidic Warrior
Druidic Warrior.description: You learn two @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.LhvuDQEyrCdg5EfU]{Druid cantrips} of your choice. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGuidance00]{Guidance} and @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplStarryWisp]{Starry Wisp} are recommended. The chosen cantrips count as Ranger spells for you, and Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for them. Whenever you gain a Ranger level, you can replace one of these cantrips with another Druid cantrip.

Action Surge.name: 动作如潮 Action Surge
Action Surge.description:
You can push yourself beyond your normal limits for a moment. On your turn, you can take one additional action, except the Magic action.

Once you use this feature, you can't do so again until you finish a Short or Long Rest. Starting at level 17, you can use it twice before a rest but only once on a turn.

Foundry Note

This feature includes a limited use that increases automatically at level 17.

Additional Fighting Style.name: 额外战斗风格 Additional Fighting Style
Additional Fighting Style.description: You gain another @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbFeats00000000.JournalEntryPage.sbHImaCB8ZMEHYkb]{Fighting Style feat} of your choice.

Champion.name: 勇士 Champion
Champion.description:
Pursue Physical Excellence in Combat

A Champion focuses on the development of martial prowess in a relentless pursuit of victory. Champions combine rigorous training with physical excellence to deal devastating blows, withstand peril, and garner glory. Whether in athletic contests or bloody battle, Champions strive for the crown of the victor.

phbftrEpicBoon00.name: Epic Boon phbftrEpicBoon00
phbftrEpicBoon00.description: You gain an @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbFeats00000000.JournalEntryPage.GxfrwkJbrIvn7reC]{Epic Boon feat} or another feat of your choice for which you qualify. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.feats24.Item.phbBoonofCombatP]{Boon of Combat Prowess} is recommended.

phbftrExtraAttac.name: Extra Attack phbftrExtraAttac
phbftrExtraAttac.description: You can attack twice instead of once whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

Fighter.name: 战士 Fighter
Fighter.description:
Core Fighter Traits

Primary Ability

Strength or Dexterity

Hit Point Die

D10 per Fighter level

Saving Throw Proficiencies

Strength and Constitution

Skill Proficiencies

Choose 2: Acrobatics, Animal Handling, Athletics, History, Insight, Intimidation, Persuasion, Perception, or Survival

Weapon Proficiencies

Simple and Martial weapons

Armor Training

Light, Medium, and Heavy armor and Shields

Starting Equipment

Choose A, B, or C: (A) @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmChainMail0]{Chain Mail}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepGreatsword]{Greatsword}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepFlail00000]{Flail}, 8 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepJavelin000]{Javelins}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagDungeoneers]{Dungeoneer's Pack}, and 4 GP; (B) @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmStuddedLea]{Studded Leather Armor}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepScimitar00]{Scimitar}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepShortsword]{Short­sword}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepLongbow000]{Longbow}, 20 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbamoArrows0000]{Arrows}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagQuiver00000]{Quiver}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagDungeoneers]{Dungeoneer's Pack}, and [[/award 11GP]]; or (C) [[/award 155GP]]

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbAppendixClass.JournalEntryPage.phbftrFighter000 inline classes="free-rules-embed"]

Becoming a Fighter …

As a Level 1 Character

  • Gain all the traits in the Core Fighter Traits table.
  • Gain the Fighter's level 1 features, which are listed in the Fighter Features table.

As a Multiclass Character

  • Gain the following traits from the Core Fighter Traits table: Hit Point Die, proficiency with Martial weapons, and training with Light and Medium armor and Shields.
  • Gain the Fighter's level 1 features, which are listed in the Fighter Features table.

Fighting Style.name: 战斗风格 Fighting Style
Fighting Style.description:
You have honed your martial prowess and gain a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbFeats00000000.JournalEntryPage.sbHImaCB8ZMEHYkb]{Fighting Style feat} of your choice. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.feats24.Item.phbfstDefense000]{Defense} is recommended.

Whenever you gain a Fighter level, you can replace the feat you chose with a different Fighting Style feat.

Heroic Warrior.name: 勇战英豪 Heroic Warrior
Heroic Warrior.description: 战斗的艰难只会使你朝胜利更进一步。在战斗中，若你回合开始时没有英雄激励，你可以获得之。

Improved Critical.name: 精通重击 Improved Critical
Improved Critical.description:
你的武器攻击和徒手打击在掷出19或20时即可造成重击。

Foundry Note

该特性会自动将重击阈值提升至 19 。

Indomitable.name: 不屈 Indomitable
Indomitable.description:
你可以重掷失败的豁免检定，并加上等同于你战士等级的额外加值。不过你必须采用重掷的结果。你必须完成一次长休才能恢复所有已消耗次数。

当你到达 13 级时，你能够在长休前使用此特性两次，到达 17 级时三次。

Foundry Note

该特性的最大使用次数会随着你的等级提升而自动增加。

Remarkable Athlete.name: 运动健将 Remarkable Athlete
Remarkable Athlete.description:
平日的训练锻打出坚实的体能，你的先攻和力量（运动）检定具有优势。

此外，当你造成重击后，你可以马上移动至多等于速度一半的距离。本次移动不会引发借机攻击。

Foundry Note

该特性会自动赋予先攻掷骰的优势。

Second Wind.name: 回气 Second Wind
Second Wind.description:
You have a limited well of physical and mental stamina that you can draw on. As a Bonus Action, you can use it to regain Hit Points equal to 1d10 plus your Fighter level.

You can use this feature twice. You regain one expended use when you finish a Short Rest, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

When you reach certain Fighter levels, you gain more uses of this feature, as shown in the Second Wind column of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbFighter000000.JournalEntryPage.wDELe3k25FQvYdrq#class-features]{Fighter Features} table.

Foundry Note

This feature automatically scales in usage and recovers the correct number of uses on a Short and Long Rest.

Studied Attacks.name: 究明攻击 Studied Attacks
Studied Attacks.description:
你已深晓对手的一举一动，并且从每次攻击中吸取经验教训。如果你对一个生物进行攻击检定但失手，那么直到你的下个合结束前，你对其的下次攻击检定具有优势。

Foundry Note

该特性不会在你下一次攻击检定中自动赋予优势。

Superior Critical.name: 高效重击 Superior Critical
Superior Critical.description:
你使用武器或徒手打击进行的攻击检定若在 d20 中掷出掷出 18 ~ 20 时即可造成重击。

Foundry Note

此特性将自动将重击命中阈值提升至18。

Survivor.name: 幸存者 Survivor
Survivor.description:
You attain the pinnacle of resilience in battle, giving you these benefits.

Defy Death. You have Advantage on Death Saving Throws. Moreover, when you roll 18–20 on a Death Saving Throw, you gain the benefit of rolling a 20 on it.

Heroic Rally. At the start of each of your turns, you regain Hit Points equal to 5 plus your Constitution modifier if you are Bloodied and have at least 1 Hit Point.

Foundry Note

This feature does not automate the Death Saving Throw changes. It includes an activity for healing but does not automatically add it when you are Bloodied.

Tactical Master.name: 战术主宰 Tactical Master
Tactical Master.description: 每当你用武器发动攻击，且你可以使用此武器的精通词条时，你可以将此次攻击的精通属性改为推离，削弱或缓速中的一种。

Tactical Mind.name: 战术思维 Tactical Mind
Tactical Mind.description: 在战场内外，你都能够运用你的战术思维。当你在一次属性检定上失败时，你可以消耗一次回气次数让你更接近成功。你掷 1d10 并将骰值加入到结果之中，而非恢复生命值。这可能会让结果变为成功。如果检定依旧失败，则不会消耗回气次数。

Expend Second Wind.name: 消耗回气
Expend Second Wind.condition: 当你在一次属性检定上失败时

Tactical Shift.name: 战术转进 Tactical Shift
Tactical Shift.description: 当你使用附赠动作回气时，你可以移动至多你速度一半的距离，且不会触发借机攻击。

Three Extra Attacks.name: 额外攻击（三） Three Extra Attacks
Three Extra Attacks.description: 每当你在回合内进行攻击动作时，你可以进行四次攻击，而不是一次。

Two Extra Attacks.name: 额外攻击（二） Two Extra Attacks
Two Extra Attacks.description: 每当你在回合内进行攻击动作时，你可以进行三次攻击，而不是一次。

phbftrWeaponMast.name: 武器精通 phbftrWeaponMast
phbftrWeaponMast.description:
Your training with weapons allows you to use the mastery properties of three kinds of Simple or Martial weapons of your choice. Whenever you finish a Long Rest, you can practice weapon drills and change one of those weapon choices.

When you reach certain Fighter levels, you gain the ability to use the mastery properties of more kinds of weapons, as shown in the Weapon Mastery column of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbFighter000000.JournalEntryPage.wDELe3k25FQvYdrq#class-features]{Fighter Features} table.

Foundry Note

To change your masteries toggle on the "Edit" mode of your sheet. On the "Details" tab click on the cog icon next to "Weapons" in the bottom right. You can place a check in the mastery column of your chosen weapons.

Agonizing Blast.name: 苦痛魔爆 Agonizing Blast
Agonizing Blast.description:
Prerequisite: Level 2+ Warlock, a Warlock Cantrip That Deals Damage

Choose one of your known Warlock cantrips that deals damage. You can add your Charisma modifier to that spell's damage rolls.

Repeatable. You can gain this invocation more than once. Each time you do so, choose a different eligible cantrip.

Foundry Note

The change to your cantrip will have to be made manually by adding "@abilities.cha.mod" to the "Bonus" field of your spell's damage.

Armor of Shadows.name: 幽影护甲 Armor of Shadows
Armor of Shadows.description:
You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMageArmor0]{Mage Armor} on yourself without expending a spell slot.

Foundry Note

The Mage Armor activity is configured with the spell's effect and duration, including an Active Effect to set the spell's provided AC formula.

Mage Armor.name: 法师护甲
Mage Armor.description: 你的基础 AC 变为 13 + 你的敏捷调整值。着装护甲则该法术提前终止。

Ascendant Step.name: 星移步法 Ascendant Step
Ascendant Step.description:
Prerequisite: Level 5+ Warlock

You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLevitate00]{Levitate} on yourself without expending a spell slot.

Levitating.name: 浮空
Levitating.description:
你可以进行上升和下降并将其作为你移动的一部分。

你只能通过推或拉一个固定的物件或平面（例如一面墙或者天花板）来进行移动，这种移动方式视为等同于攀爬。

Devil's Sight.name: 魔鬼视界 Devil's Sight
Devil's Sight.description:
先决：魔契师等级 2+

你在黑暗和微光中拥有 120 尺的可视距离，而无论其属于魔法性的还是非魔法性的。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一个被动效果，能赋予你 120 尺的黑暗视觉。

Devouring Blade.name: 灭世魔刃 Devouring Blade
Devouring Blade.description:
Prerequisite: Level 12+ Warlock, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classes24.Item.phbinvThirstingB]{Thirsting Blade} Invocation

The Extra Attack of your Thirsting Blade invocation confers two extra attacks rather than one.

Eldritch Mind.name: 魔能意志 Eldritch Mind
Eldritch Mind.description: 你为保持专注所进行的体质豁免具有优势。

Eldritch Smite.name: 魔能斩 Eldritch Smite
Eldritch Smite.description:
Prerequisite: Level 5+ Warlock, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classes24.Item.phbinvPactBlade0]{Pact of the Blade} Invocation

Once per turn when you hit a creature with your pact weapon, you can expend a Pact Magic spell slot to deal an extra 1d8 Force damage to the target, plus another 1d8 per level of the spell slot, and you can give the target the &Reference[Prone] condition if it is Huge or smaller.

Foundry Note

The Smite activity consumes a Pact Magic spell slot and increases the damage based on your pact spell level.

Smite.name: 斩击
Smite.condition: 每回合一次，当你用契约武器命中一个生物时

Eldritch Spear.name: 魔能长枪 Eldritch Spear
Eldritch Spear.description:
先决：魔契师等级 2+，知晓一道造成伤害的魔契师戏法

选择一道你已知的造成伤害且射程至少为10尺的魔契师戏法。当你施展此法术时，其射程增加等于你魔契师等级30倍的尺数。

可复选。 你可以多次选择本祈唤。每次这么做时，你都必须选择不同的戏法。

Foundry Note

使用增距附魔功能，将选定的戏法拖拽至聊天卡牌即可提升其射程，并在名称后追加魔能长枪后缀以便于识别。

Fiendish Vigor.name: 邪魔活力 Fiendish Vigor
Fiendish Vigor.description:
Prerequisite: Level 2+ Warlock

You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFalseLife0]{False Life} on yourself without expending a spell slot. When you cast the spell with this feature, you don't roll the die for the Temporary Hit Points; you automatically get the highest number on the die.

Foundry Note

The False Life activity includes the maximum amount of healing.

Gaze of Two Minds.name: 共视感官 Gaze of Two Minds
Gaze of Two Minds.description:
Prerequisite: Level 5+ Warlock

You can use a Bonus Action to touch a willing creature and perceive through its senses until the end of your next turn. As long as the creature is on the same plane of existence as you, you can take a Bonus Action on subsequent turns to maintain this connection, extending the duration until the end of your next turn. The connection ends if you don't maintain it in this way.

While perceiving through the other creature's senses, you benefit from any special senses possessed by that creature, and you can cast spells as if you were in your space or the other creature's space if the two of you are within 60 feet of each other.

Gift of the Depths.name: 深海馈赠 Gift of the Depths
Gift of the Depths.description:
Prerequisite: Level 5+ Warlock

You can breathe underwater, and you gain a Swim Speed equal to your Speed.

You can also cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplWaterBreat]{Water Breathing} once without expending a spell slot. You regain the ability to cast it in this way again when you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

The Gift Water Breathing activity consumes a limited use and includes an Active Effect for tracking the chosen creatures.

Gift of the Protectors.name: 守护馈赠 Gift of the Protectors
Gift of the Protectors.description:
Prerequisite: Level 9+ Warlock, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classes24.Item.phbinvPactTome00]{Pact of the Tome} Invocation

A new page appears in your @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.CwWbeQ6XyqFzbMYw]{Book of Shadows} when you conjure it. With your permission, a creature can take an action to write its name on that page, which can contain a number of names equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of one name).

When any creature whose name is on the page is reduced to 0 Hit Points but not killed outright, the creature magically drops to 1 Hit Point instead. Once this magic is triggered, no creature can benefit from it until you finish a Long Rest.

As a Magic action, you can erase a name on the page by touching it.

Foundry Note

The Protect activity consumes a use of its activity which refreshes every Long Rest.

The Write Name activity consumes a use of the item which can be used for tracking how many names you've written down.

The Erase Name activity will restore a use of the item and allows you to add another name.

Protect.name: 保护
Protect.condition: 当一个名字在这一页上的生物生命值降为 0，但是还没有完全死亡

Investment of the Chain Master.name: 链主赋能 Investment of the Chain Master
Investment of the Chain Master.description:
Prerequisite: Level 5+ Warlock, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classes24.Item.phbinvPactChain0]{Pact of the Chain} Invocation

When you cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFindFamili]{Find Familiar}, you infuse the summoned familiar with a measure of your eldritch power, granting the creature the following benefits.

Aerial or Aquatic. The familiar gains either a Fly Speed or a Swim Speed (your choice) of 40 feet.

Quick Attack. As a Bonus Action, you can command the familiar to take the Attack action.

Necrotic or Radiant Damage. Whenever the familiar deals Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing damage, you can make it deal Necrotic or Radiant damage instead.

Your Save DC. If the familiar forces a creature to make a saving throw, it uses your spell save DC.

Resistance. When the familiar takes damage, you can take a Reaction to grant it Resistance against that damage.

Foundry Note

The Find Familiar with Flight and with Swimming activities both allow you to summon a familiar with the relevant movement bonus. Both activities consume a Pact Magic spell slot.

The Invest with Resistance activity includes an Active Effect for resisting each type of damage which can be applied to get the relevant resistance. Be sure you disable/delete the previous Active Effect in the "Effects" tab of your sheet when you change Resistances.

The familiar automatically uses your Save DC.

Lessons of the First Ones.name: 原初之一的教习 Lessons of the First Ones
Lessons of the First Ones.description:
Prerequisite: Level 2+ Warlock

You have received knowledge from an elder entity of the multiverse, allowing you to gain one @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbFeats00000000.JournalEntryPage.otAeQs0TLHYIBNuj]{Origin feat} of your choice.

Repeatable. You can gain this invocation more than once. Each time you do so, choose a different Origin feat.

Lifedrinker.name: 饮命者 Lifedrinker
Lifedrinker.description:
Prerequisite: Level 9+ Warlock, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classes24.Item.phbinvPactBlade0]{Pact of the Blade} Invocation

Once per turn when you hit a creature with your pact weapon, you can deal an extra 1d6 Necrotic, Psychic, or Radiant damage (your choice) to the creature, and you can expend one of your Hit Point Dice to roll it and regain a number of Hit Points equal to the roll plus your Constitution modifier (minimum of 1 Hit Point).

Foundry Note

The Damage activity allows you to choose the type of damage in the roll's dialog. It will remember your choice going forward.

The Heal (Largest Hit Die) and Smallest Hit Die activities expends the relevant Hit Die and provides a healing roll with your Constitution modifier included. Which you choose only matters if you are multi-classed with multiple hit die types.

damage.condition: 每回合一次，当你使用契约武器命中某个生物时

Heal (Largest Hit Die).name: 治疗（最大生命骰）
Heal (Largest Hit Die).condition: 每回合一次，当你使用契约武器命中某个生物时

Heal (Smallest Hit Die).name: 治疗（最小生命骰）
Heal (Smallest Hit Die).condition: 每回合一次，当你使用契约武器命中某个生物时

Mask of Many Faces.name: 千面之脸 Mask of Many Faces
Mask of Many Faces.description:
Prerequisite: Level 2+ Warlock

You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDisguiseSe]{Disguise Self} without expending a spell slot.

Foundry Note

The Cast activity can be used in-place of Disguise Self and includes an Active Effect for tracking when you are disguised.

Disguised.name: 乔装
Disguised.description: 一名生物想要分辨你是否易容，则必须使用一个研究动作研究你的外貌，并成功于一次对抗你法术豁免DC的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv]] 检定。

Master of Myriad Forms.name: 万形之主 Master of Myriad Forms
Master of Myriad Forms.description:
Prerequisite: Level 5+ Warlock

You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplAlterSelf0]{Alter Self} without expending a spell slot.

Foundry Note

This feature includes Alter Self's activities.

The Aquatic Adaptation, Change Appearance, and Natural Weapons activities include Active Effects for tracking your choice and require Concentration.

The Attack activities can be used for your attack/damage rolls when you choose the Natural Weapons option.

Aquatic Adaptation.name: 水生适应
Aquatic Adaptation.description: 你可以在水下呼吸，并且获得等同于步行速度的游泳速度。

Natural Weapon.name: 天生武器
Natural Weapon.description: 当你使用徒手打击以这些新长的器官造成伤害时，它会造成 1d6 对应类型伤害，而非你通常的徒手打击伤害，并且你使用你的施法属性调整值来作为你该次攻击及其伤害的调整值，而非力量调整值。

Misty Visions.name: 幻象迷踪 Misty Visions
Misty Visions.description:
Prerequisite: Level 2+ Warlock

You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplSilentImag]{Silent Image} without expending a spell slot.

Foundry Note

This feature includes Silent Image's activities and can be used in its place.

One with Shadows.name: 融身入影 One with Shadows
One with Shadows.description:
Prerequisite: Level 5+ Warlock

While you're in an area of &Reference[Dim Light] or &Reference[Darkness], you can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility} on yourself without expending a spell slot.

Foundry Note

The Cast activity can be used in place of the Invisibility spell and includes an Active Effect that sets the Invisible status effect.

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: 如果你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Otherworldly Leap.name: 超凡跳跃 Otherworldly Leap
Otherworldly Leap.description:
Prerequisite: Level 2+ Warlock

You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplJump000000]{Jump} on yourself without expending a spell slot.

Foundry Note

This feature can be used in place of the Jump spell and includes an Active Effect for tracking.

Jump.name: 跳跃术
Jump.description: 在法术结束前，每个你的回合内一次该生物可以消耗 10 尺移动力来跳跃 30 尺。

Pact of the Blade.name: 刃之魔契 Pact of the Blade
Pact of the Blade.description:
As a Bonus Action, you can conjure a pact weapon in your hand—a Simple or Martial Melee weapon of your choice with which you bond—or create a bond with a magic weapon you touch; you can't bond with a magic weapon if someone else is attuned to it or another Warlock is bonded with it. Until the bond ends, you have proficiency with the weapon, and you can use it as a Spellcasting Focus.

Whenever you attack with the bonded weapon, you can use your Charisma modifier for the attack and damage rolls instead of using Strength or Dexterity; and you can cause the weapon to deal Necrotic, Psychic, or Radiant damage or its normal damage type.

Your bond with the weapon ends if you use this feature's Bonus Action again, if the weapon is more than 5 feet away from you for 1 minute or more, or if you die. A conjured weapon disappears when the bond ends.

Pact of the Chain.name: 链之魔契 Pact of the Chain
Pact of the Chain.description:
You learn the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFindFamili]{Find Familiar} spell and can cast it as a Magic action without expending a spell slot.

When you cast the spell, you choose one of the normal forms for your familiar or one of the following special forms: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmImp00000000000]{Imp}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmPseudodragon00]{Pseudodragon}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmQuasit00000000]{Quasit}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmSkeleton000000]{Skeleton}, Slaad Tadpole, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmSphinxOfWonder]{Sphinx of Wonder}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmSprite00000000]{Sprite}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmVenomousSnake0]{Venomous Snake}.

Additionally, when you take the Attack action, you can forgo one of your own attacks to allow your familiar to make one attack of its own with its Reaction.

Foundry Note

The Summon Familiar activity includes the normal summoning options and the Summon Familiar (Expanded Options) activity includes the additional options.

Pact of the Tome.name: 书之魔契 Pact of the Tome
Pact of the Tome.description:
Stitching together strands of shadow, you conjure forth a book in your hand at the end of a Short or Long Rest. This @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classes24.Item.phbwlkBookOfShad]{Book of Shadows} (you determine its appearance) contains eldritch magic that only you can access, granting you the benefits below. The book disappears if you conjure another book with this feature or if you die.

Cantrips and Rituals. When the book appears, choose three cantrips, and choose two level 1 spells that have the Ritual tag. The spells can be from any class's spell list, and they must be spells you don't already have prepared. While the book is on your person, you have the chosen spells prepared, and they function as Warlock spells for you.

Spellcasting Focus. You can use the book as a Spellcasting Focus.

Repelling Blast.name: 斥力魔爆 Repelling Blast
Repelling Blast.description:
Prerequisite: Level 2+ Warlock, a Warlock Cantrip That Deals Damage via an Attack Roll

Choose one of your known Warlock cantrips that requires an attack roll. When you hit a Large or smaller creature with that cantrip, you can push the creature up to 10 feet straight away from you.

Repeatable. You can gain this invocation more than once. Each time you do so, choose a different eligible cantrip.

Foundry Note

The Make Repelling activity can be used to enchant a cantrip which adds ", Repelling" as a reminder.
Repelling Blast.requirements: Warlock Cantrip That Deals Damage via an Attack

Repelling Blast.name: 斥力魔爆
Repelling Blast.description: 选择一道你已知的需要一次攻击检定的魔契师戏法。当你用该戏法命中了一个大型或更小的生物，你可以将目标推开至多 10 尺。

Thirsting Blade.name: 饥渴魔刃 Thirsting Blade
Thirsting Blade.description:
Prerequisite: Level 5+ Warlock, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classes24.Item.phbinvPactBlade0]{Pact of the Blade} Invocation.

You gain the Extra Attack feature for your pact weapon only. With that feature, you can attack twice with the weapon instead of once when you take the Attack action on your turn.

Visions of Distant Realms.name: 穹宇尽视 Visions of Distant Realms
Visions of Distant Realms.description:
Prerequisite: Level 9+ Warlock

You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplArcaneEye0]{Arcane Eye} without expending a spell slot.

Foundry Note

This feature can be used in place of Arcane Eye and includes a Summon activity.

Whispers of the Grave.name: 坟墓低语 Whispers of the Grave
Whispers of the Grave.description:
Prerequisite: Level 7+ Warlock

You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplSpeakwithD]{Speak with Dead} without expending a spell slot.

Witch Sight.name: 巫术视界 Witch Sight
Witch Sight.description:
先决：魔契师等级 15+

你获得 30 尺范围内的真实视觉。

Foundry Note

T该特性包含一种被动效应，能自动授予真实视觉。

Careful Spell.name: 谨慎法术 Careful Spell
Careful Spell.description:
Cost: 1 Sorcery Point

When you cast a spell that forces other creatures to make a saving throw, you can protect some of those creatures from the spell's full force. To do so, spend 1 Sorcery Point and choose a number of those creatures up to your Charisma modifier (minimum of one creature). A chosen creature automatically succeeds on its saving throw against the spell, and it takes no damage if it would normally take half damage on a successful save.

Creatures You Can Protect: [[lookup @abilities.cha.mod]]

Careful Spell.name: 谨慎法术
Careful Spell.condition: 当你施展一个强迫其他生物进行豁免的法术时

Distant Spell.name: 远程法术 Distant Spell
Distant Spell.description:
Cost: 1 Sorcery Point

When you cast a spell that has a range of at least 5 feet, you can spend 1 Sorcery Point to double the spell's range. Or when you cast a spell that has a range of Touch, you can spend 1 Sorcery Point to make the spell's range 30 feet.

Distant Spell.name: 远程法术
Distant Spell.condition: 当你施展一个射程至少为 5 尺的法术时或者当你施展一个射程为触及的法术时

Empowered Spell.name: 强效法术 Empowered Spell
Empowered Spell.description:
Cost: 1 Sorcery Point

When you roll damage for a spell, you can spend 1 Sorcery Point to reroll a number of the damage dice up to your Charisma modifier (minimum of one, currently [[lookup @abilities.cha.mod]]), and you must use the new rolls.

You can use Empowered Spell even if you've already used a different Metamagic option during the casting of the spell.

Empowered Spell.name: 强效法术
Empowered Spell.condition: 当你为一个法术进行伤害掷骰时

Extended Spell.name: 延效法术 Extended Spell
Extended Spell.description:
消耗：1 术法点

当你施展一个持续时间为 1 分钟或更长的法术时，你可以消耗 1 术法点使其持续时间翻倍，最多变为 24 小时。

如果被你延效的法术需要专注，你在为维持此法术专注所做的豁免上具有优势。

Extended Spell.name: 延效法术
Extended Spell.condition: 当你施展一个持续时间为 1 分钟或更长的法术时

Heightened Spell.name: 升阶法术 Heightened Spell
Heightened Spell.description:
消耗：2 术法点

当你施展一个强迫生物进行豁免的法术时，你可以消耗 2 术法点来强迫法术影响的某一个生物对此法术的豁免具有劣势。

Heightened Spell.name: 升阶法术
Heightened Spell.condition: 当你施展一个强迫生物进行豁免的法术时

Quickened Spell.name: 瞬发法术 Quickened Spell
Quickened Spell.description:
Cost: 2 Sorcery Points

When you cast a spell that has a casting time of an action, you can spend 2 Sorcery Points to change the casting time to a Bonus Action for this casting. You can't modify a spell in this way if you've already cast a level 1+ spell on the current turn, nor can you cast a level 1+ spell on this turn after modifying a spell in this way.

Quickened Spell.name: 瞬发法术
Quickened Spell.condition: 当你施展一个施法时间为动作的法术时

Seeking Spell.name: 追踪法术 Seeking Spell
Seeking Spell.description:
Cost: 1 Sorcery Point

If you make an attack roll for a spell and miss, you can spend 1 Sorcery Point to reroll the d20, and you must use the new roll.

You can use Seeking Spell even if you've already used a different Metamagic option during the casting of the spell.

Seeking Spell.name: 追踪法术
Seeking Spell.condition: 当你为一道法术进行一次攻击检定并未命中时

Subtle Spell.name: 精妙法术 Subtle Spell
Subtle Spell.description:
消耗：1 术法点

当你施展一道法术时，你可以消耗 1 术法点来忽视法术所需的语言，姿势和材料成分，但不能忽视那些会被消耗或在法术描述中写明了具体价值的材料成分。

Transmuted Spell.name: 转化法术 Transmuted Spell
Transmuted Spell.description:
消耗：1 术法点

当你施展一道造成以下伤害类型的法术时，你可以消耗 1 术法点将其伤害类型变成以下伤害类型中的另一种：强酸，寒冷，火焰，闪电，毒素，雷鸣。

Transmuted Spell.name: 转化法术
Transmuted Spell.condition: 当你施展造成强酸、寒冷、火焰、闪电、毒素或雷鸣伤害的法术时

Twinned Spell.name: 孪生法术 Twinned Spell
Twinned Spell.description:
Cost: 1 Sorcery Point

When you cast a spell, such as Charm Person, that can be cast with a higher-level spell slot to target an additional creature, you can spend 1 Sorcery Point to increase the spell's effective level by 1.

Twinned Spell.name: 孪生法术
Twinned Spell.condition: 当你施展一个可以通过升环施法来提升法术目标数的法术时

Acrobatic Movement.name: 飞檐走壁 Acrobatic Movement
Acrobatic Movement.description: 当未穿着任何护甲也没持用盾牌时，在你回合中移动时，你可以沿着垂直表面移动，且横越水面而不下沉。

Body and Mind.name: 天人合一 Body and Mind
Body and Mind.description: 你已将肉体和思想磨练到全新的高度，你的敏捷和感知属性增加 4 点，且这两项属性的最大值变为 25。

Deflect Attacks.name: 拨挡攻击 Deflect Attacks
Deflect Attacks.description:
当你被一次伤害中包含钝击，穿刺或挥砍伤害的攻击检定命中时，你可以执行反应减少此次攻击对你造成伤害的总值，减值等于 1d10 + 你的敏捷调整至 + 你的武僧等级。

若被拨挡攻击的伤害减少至 0，则你可以消耗 1 点功力将此次攻击的部分伤害重新定向。如果是近战攻击，选择你周围 5 尺内的一个你可见的生物；如果是远程攻击，选择 60 尺内一个不位于完全掩护后的你可见的生物。该生物必须成功通过一次敏捷豁免，否则受到相当于你 2 个武艺骰 + 你的敏捷调整值的伤害。其伤害类型与原先的伤害类型相同。

Foundry Note

调息 行动可用来治疗自身，以削减总伤害，倘若其不足以将总伤害削减至 0 时。

重新定向 行动可在你能将其减至 0 的情况下用于掷骰伤害并消耗你的 1 点功力。你可以在掷骰对话框中选择伤害类型。随着你等级的提升，骰面会自动增加。

Reduce.name: 调息
Reduce.condition: 当你被一次伤害中包含钝击，穿刺或挥砍伤害的攻击检定命中时

Redirect.name: 重新定向
Redirect.condition: 若被拨挡攻击的伤害减少至 0
Redirect.rangeSpecial: 近战攻击 5 尺或远程攻击 60 尺

Deflect Energy.name: 拨挡能量 Deflect Energy
Deflect Energy.description:
你的拨挡化劲现在可以处理任何伤害类型的攻击，不再仅限于钝击、挥砍和穿刺。

调息 行动可用来治疗自身，以削减总伤害，倘若其不足以将总伤害削减至 0 时。

重新定向 行动可在你能将其减至 0 的情况下用于掷骰伤害并消耗你的 1 点功力。你可以在掷骰对话框中选择伤害类型。随着你等级的提升，骰面会自动增加。

Reduce.name: 调息
Reduce.condition: 当你被一次伤害中包含钝击，穿刺或挥砍伤害的攻击检定命中时

Redirect.name: 重新定向
Redirect.condition: 若被拨挡攻击的伤害减少至 0
Redirect.rangeSpecial: 近战攻击 5 尺或远程攻击 60 尺

Disciplined Survivor.name: 圆融自在 Disciplined Survivor
Disciplined Survivor.description:
你的身心修行已然有所成就，你获得所有豁免的熟练。

此外，当你豁免失败时，你可以消耗 1 点功力重掷豁免，但必须使用重掷的结果。

Foundry Note

随着等级提升，将自动获得额外的豁免熟练。

使用该特性需消耗 1 点功力。

Empowered Strikes.name: 真力驻拳 Empowered Strikes
Empowered Strikes.description:
当你徒手打击造成伤害时，你可以将伤害类型替换为力场伤害

Foundry Note

此特性上的真力驻拳行动允许你在掷骰对话框中选择造成力场或钝击伤害。该伤害使用武艺骰进行计算，并将随角色等级提升自动更新。

phbmnkEpicBoon00.name: 传奇恩惠 phbmnkEpicBoon00
phbmnkEpicBoon00.description:
You gain an @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbFeats00000000.JournalEntryPage.GxfrwkJbrIvn7reC]{Epic Boon feat} or another feat of your choice for which you qualify. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbFeats00000000.JournalEntryPage.GxfrwkJbrIvn7reC#boon-of-irresistible-offense]{Boon of Irresistible Offense} is recommended.

Foundry Note

You will be prompted for a choice while leveling up.

Evasion.name: 反射闪避 Evasion
Evasion.description:
你在成为某一范围效应影响对象时，若该效应允许你通过成功的敏捷豁免来使伤害减半，则你在该豁免成功时不受伤害，而豁免失败时只受一半伤害。

若你陷入失能状态，则无法使用该特性。

phbmnkExtraAttac.name: Extra Attack phbmnkExtraAttac
phbmnkExtraAttac.description: You can attack twice instead of once whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

Fleet Step.name: 神行步 Fleet Step
Fleet Step.description: 当你以附赠动作执行除疾步如风以外的行为，你可以同时使用疾步如风，作为该附赠动作的一部分。

Heightened Focus.name: 出神入化 Heightened Focus
Heightened Focus.description:
你的疾风连击、闪转腾挪和疾步如风将获得以下额外效果。

疾风连击。 你可以消耗 1 点功力并以一个附赠动作发动三次徒手打击，而非两次。

闪转腾挪。 当你消耗 1 点功力使用闪转腾挪时，你掷两枚武艺骰，获得等同于掷骰结果的临时生命值。

疾步如风。 当你消耗 1 点功力使用疾步如风时，你可以选择一名距你5尺内，大型或更小的自愿生物，你带着该生物一起移动直至该回合结束，该生物以此进行的移动不触发借机攻击。

Foundry Note

进行疾风连击行动将消耗 1 点功力，随后你可发动三次徒手打击。

闪转腾挪行动中，系统将为你自动投骰临时生命值。

Patient Defense.name: 闪转腾挪
Patient Defense.condition: 当你消耗 1 点功力使用闪转腾挪时

Martial Arts.name: 武艺 Martial Arts
Martial Arts.description:
你的武术训练让你精通使用徒手打击和武僧武器， 包括以下类型：

  • 简易近战武器
  • 具有轻型属性的军用近战武器

当你徒手或仅使用武僧武器，并且未着装护甲或持盾时，你会获得以下增益：

额外徒手打击。你能以附赠动作发动一次徒手打击。

武艺骰。 可以选择用 d6 骰代替原本的伤害掷骰。该骰子将随武僧职业等级的提升而增大，具体数据见武僧特性表中“武艺”一栏。

敏捷攻击。 可以用敏捷值代替力量值进行攻击检定和伤害掷骰。此外，当你使用徒手打击来进行推撞或擒抱时，你也可以用敏捷调整值代替力量调整值来计算豁免难度。

Monk.name: 武僧 Monk
Monk.description:
Core Monk Traits

Primary Ability

Dexterity and Wisdom

Hit Point Die

D8 per Monk level

Saving Throw Proficiencies

Strength and Dexterity

Skill Proficiencies

Choose 2: Acrobatics, Athletics, History, Insight, Religion, or Stealth

Weapon Proficiencies

Simple weapons and Martial weapons that have the Light property

Tool Proficiencies

Choose one type of Artisan's Tools or Musical Instrument

Armor Training

None

Starting Equipment

Choose A or B: (A) @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepSpear00000]{Spear}, 5 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepDagger0000]{Daggers}, Artisan's Tools or Musical Instrument chosen for the tool proficiency above, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagExplorersPa]{Explorer's Pack}, and [[/award 11GP]]; or (B) [[/award 50GP]]

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbAppendixClass.JournalEntryPage.phbmnkMonk000000 inline classes="free-rules-embed"]

Becoming a Monk …

As a Level 1 Character

  • Gain all the traits in the Core Monk Traits table.
  • Gain the Monk's level 1 features, which are listed in the Monk Features table.

As a Multiclass Character

  • Gain the Hit Point Die trait from the Core Monk Traits table.
  • Gain the Monk's level 1 features, which are listed in the Monk Features table.

Monk's Focus.name: 武僧武功 Monk's Focus
Monk's Focus.description:
Your focus and martial training allow you to harness a well of extraordinary energy within yourself. This energy is represented by Focus Points. Your Monk level determines the number of points you have, as shown in the Focus Points column of the Monk Features table.

You can expend these points to enhance or fuel certain Monk features. You start knowing three such features: Flurry of Blows, Patient Defense, and Step of the Wind, each of which is detailed below.

When you expend a Focus Point, it is unavailable until you finish a Short or Long Rest, at the end of which you regain all your expended points.

Some features that use Focus Points require your target to make a saving throw. The save DC equals 8 plus your Wisdom modifier and Proficiency Bonus.

Flurry of Blows. You can expend 1 Focus Point to make two Unarmed Strikes as a Bonus Action.

Patient Defense. You can take the Disengage action as a Bonus Action. Alternatively, you can expend 1 Focus Point to take both the Disengage and the Dodge actions as a Bonus Action.

Step of the Wind. You can take the Dash action as a Bonus Action. Alternatively, you can expend 1 Focus Point to take both the Disengage and Dash actions as a Bonus Action, and your jump distance is doubled for the turn.

Foundry Note

The Flurry of Blows activity is a Bonus Action which expends a Focus Point and includes the Attack Roll and Damage for an Unarmored Strike using your Martial Arts Die which automatically scales as you level up.

The Patient Defense Bonus Action activity includes an Active Effect for tracking that you're Disengaged. The Patient Defense (Focus Point) activity expends a Focus Point and includes an Active Effect that adds the Dodging status.

The Step of the Wind Bonus Action activity expends 1 Focus Point and includes an Active Effect for tracking that you're Disengaged.

Open Hand Technique.name: 散打技巧 Open Hand Technique
Open Hand Technique.description:
当你用疾风连击特性的攻击击中敌人时，你可以让该目标承受下列效应之一：

截击。 目标直到你的下一回合结束前，无法执行借机攻击。

击退。 目标必须进行一次力量豁免，豁免失败则被往远离你的方向推动至多15尺。

击倒。 目标必须进行一次敏捷豁免，豁免失败则应击倒地。

Foundry Note

截击行动包含用于跟进受截击目标的激活效应。

击倒行动包含施加倒地状态的激活效应。

Addle.name: 截击
Addle.condition: 当你用疾风连击特性的攻击击中敌人时

Push.name: 击退
Push.condition: 当你用疾风连击特性的攻击击中敌人时

Topple.name: 击倒
Topple.condition: 当你用疾风连击特性的攻击击中敌人时

Warrior of the Open Hand.name: 散打武者 Warrior of the Open Hand
Warrior of the Open Hand.description:
散打随心

散打武者是徒手战斗的大师，他们学习了推离和绊摔的技艺妨敌，并用内力保护自己免受伤害。

Perfect Focus.name: 明镜止水 Perfect Focus
Perfect Focus.description:
若你在投掷先攻，且选择不使用运转周天时，你的功力为 3 点或更少，则你的功力恢复至 4 点。

Foundry Note

该特性不会自动恢复已消耗的功力点。

Quivering Palm.name: 渗透劲 Quivering Palm
Quivering Palm.description:
你获得了将内劲击入他人体内的能力。当你以徒手打击命中一个生物时，可以消耗 4 点功力打入暗劲，其持续相当于你武僧等级的天数。在你使用你的动作将之结束前，暗劲是无害的。此外，当你在自己的回合执行攻击动作时，你可以将其中一次攻击替换为这个动作使暗劲结束。若你如此做，你和目标必须处于同一个存在位面。

当你结束暗劲时，目标必须进行一次体质豁免，失败则受到 10d12 力场伤害，成功则只受到一半伤害。

在同一时间你只能用这个特性使一个生物处于此效应中。你可以结束某人身上的暗劲而不造成伤害（不需要动作）。

Foundry Note

该特性包含的打入暗劲行动将消耗4点功力，并附带可追踪已施加致死暗劲目标的激活效应。

该特性包含的结束暗劲行动将触发豁免检定与伤害掷骰。

End Vibrations.name: 结束暗劲
End Vibrations.condition: 当你在自己的回合执行攻击动作时

Instill Vibrations.name: 打入暗劲
Instill Vibrations.condition: 当你以徒手打击命中一个生物时

Slow Fall.name: 轻身坠 Slow Fall
Slow Fall.description:
当你要承受坠落伤害时，你可以使用反应将伤害减少等同于五倍武僧职业等级的数值。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一项调息行动，可恢复相当于武僧等级五倍的已损失生命值。

Stunning Strike.name: 震慑拳 Stunning Strike
Stunning Strike.description:
每回合一次，当你使用徒手打击或武僧武器命中一个生物后，你可以消耗 1 点功力尝试发动震慑拳。目标必须进行一次体质豁免，豁免失败则陷入震慑状态直至你的下一回合开始。若豁免成功，则目标的速度减半，持续至你的下个回合开始。并且下一次对该目标进行的攻击检定具有优势。

Foundry Note

此特性包含一次豁免检定，以及以下两个激活效应：若目标豁免失败，将施加“震慑”状态；若豁免成功，则会施加一个用于追踪其移动速度减半、且下一次对其进行的攻击检定具有优势的“缓速”激活效应。

save.condition: 每回合一次，当你使用徒手打击或武僧武器命中一个生物后

Superior Defense.name: 无懈可击 Superior Defense
Superior Defense.description:
在你的回合开始时，你可以消耗 3 点功力提高自己抵挡伤害的能力，持续 1 分钟或直至你陷入失能状态。

Foundry Note

此特性将消耗 3 点功力 ，并包含一个激活效应，该效果将赋予相应的抗性。

phbmnkUnarmoredD.name: 无甲防御 phbmnkUnarmoredD
phbmnkUnarmoredD.description:
未着装任何护甲也没持用盾牌时，你的护甲等级等于 10 ＋ 你的敏捷调整值 ＋ 你的感知调整值。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一个激活效应，可动态更新你的护甲等级。

Unarmored Movement.name: 无甲移动 Unarmored Movement
Unarmored Movement.description:
当未穿着任何护甲也没持用盾牌时，你的移动速度增加 10 尺。该加值将随着武僧职业等级的提升而增加，具体数值见武僧特性表中无甲移动一栏。

当前数值 Current Increase: [[lookup @scale.monk.unarmored-movement]]

Foundry Note

此特性包含一个无甲移动的激活效应，可使你的移动速度增加 10 尺。但该数值不会随等级提升自动更新，你需要手动编辑数值以匹配当前增益。

Uncanny Metabolism.name: 运转周天 Uncanny Metabolism
Uncanny Metabolism.description:
当你投掷先攻时，你可以获得所有已消耗的专注点。当你这么做时，掷出一个武艺骰，恢复投出点数+你武僧等级的生命值。

一旦你使用了此能力，直到你完成一次长休前你都不能再次使用它。

Foundry Note

使用该特性可恢复所有已消耗的功力，并提供一次治疗掷骰来恢复你的生命值。它包含在长休期间的一次免费使用。

Wholeness of Body.name: 混元体 Wholeness of Body
Wholeness of Body.description:
你获得自疗的能力。以一个附赠动作，掷你的武艺骰，你恢复等同于掷骰结果+你感知调整值的生命值（最少为1）。

你可以使用此能力的次数等同于你的感知调整值（最少为1）。且在完成一次长休后恢复所有使用次数。

Abjure Foes.name: 破胆斥喝 Abjure Foes
Abjure Foes.description:
As a Magic action, you can expend one use of this class's Channel Divinity to overwhelm foes with awe. As you present your Holy Symbol or weapon, you can target a number of creatures equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of one creature) that you can see within 60 feet of yourself. Each target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[Frightened] condition for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. While Frightened in this way, a target can do only one of the following on its turns: move, take an action, or take a Bonus Action.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which applies the Frightened condition.

Aura Expansion.name: 灵光增效 Aura Expansion
Aura Expansion.description:
你的守护灵光的光环现在延展到30尺

Foundry Note

你的光环范围会随着等级提升自动更新。

phbpdnChannelDiv.name: 引导神力 phbpdnChannelDiv
phbpdnChannelDiv.description:
You can channel divine energy directly from the Outer Planes, using it to fuel magical effects. You start with one such effect: Divine Sense, which is described below. Other Paladin features give additional Channel Divinity effect options. Each time you use this class's Channel Divinity, you choose which effect from this class to create.

You can use this class's Channel Divinity twice. You regain one of its expended uses when you finish a Short Rest, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest. You gain an additional use when you reach Paladin level 11.

If a Channel Divinity effect requires a saving throw, the DC equals the spell save DC from this class's Spellcasting feature.

Divine Sense. As a Bonus Action, you can open your awareness to detect Celestials, Fiends, and Undead. For the next 10 minutes or until you have the Incapacitated condition, you know the location of any creature of those types within 60 feet of yourself, and you know its creature type. Within the same radius, you also detect the presence of any place or object that has been consecrated or desecrated, as with the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHallow0000]{Hallow} spell.

Foundry Note

The uses of your Channel Divinity increase automatically as you level up. It automatically regains the correct uses after Short and Long Rests.

The Divine Sense activity includes an Active Effect but it does not automatically reveal the given creatures.

Aura of Courage.name: 勇气灵光 Aura of Courage
Aura of Courage.description:
你与友方生物在守护灵光内不会陷入恐慌。对于已陷入恐慌的友方生物，进入灵光后会使恐慌的效果不再触发。

Foundry Note

该特性包含用于跟进光环范围内角色的激活效应，但该效果不会自动添加/移除，且不会移除目标的恐慌状态。

Aura of Devotion.name: 奉献灵光 Aura of Devotion
Aura of Devotion.description:
你与守护灵光内盟友获得魅惑免疫。陷入魅惑的盟友进入灵光时，该状态在灵光内会暂时无效。

Foundry Note

该特性包含用于跟进光环受影响角色的激活效应，但不会自动应用光环效应。

Oath of Devotion Spells.name: 奉献之誓法术 Oath of Devotion Spells
Oath of Devotion Spells.description:
The magic of your oath ensures you always have certain spells ready; when you reach a Paladin level specified in the Oath of Devotion Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

phbpdnEpicBoon00.name: 传奇恩惠 phbpdnEpicBoon00
phbpdnEpicBoon00.description:
You gain an @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbFeats00000000.JournalEntryPage.GxfrwkJbrIvn7reC]{Epic Boon feat} or another feat of your choice for which you qualify. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.feats24.Item.phbBoonofTruesig]{Boon of Truesight} is recommended.

Foundry Note

You will be prompted for a choice while leveling up.

phbpdnExtraAttac.name: Extra Attack phbpdnExtraAttac
phbpdnExtraAttac.description: You can attack twice instead of once whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

Faithful Steed.name: 忠诚坐骑 Faithful Steed
Faithful Steed.description:
You can call on the aid of an otherworldly steed. You always have the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFindSteed0]{Find Steed} spell prepared.

You can also cast the spell once without expending a spell slot, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

The Find Steed spell is added to your spell list as always prepared and with a free use per Long Rest when you reach this level.

phbpdnFightingSt.name: 战斗风格 phbpdnFightingSt
phbpdnFightingSt.description:
You gain a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbFeats00000000.JournalEntryPage.sbHImaCB8ZMEHYkb]{Fighting Style feat} of your choice. Instead of choosing one of those feats, you can choose the option below.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.classes24.Item.phbfstBlessedWar caption=false]

Holy Nimbus.name: 至圣光轮 Holy Nimbus
Holy Nimbus.description:
As a Bonus Action, you can imbue your Aura of Protection with holy power, granting the benefits below for 10 minutes or until you end them (no action required). Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a Long Rest. You can also restore your use of it by expending a level 5 spell slot (no action required).

Holy Ward. You have Advantage on any saving throw you are forced to make by a Fiend or an Undead.

Radiant Damage. Whenever an enemy starts its turn in the aura, that creature takes Radiant damage equal to your Charisma modifier plus your Proficiency Bonus.

Sunlight. The aura is filled with Bright Light that is sunlight.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect for tracking your Holy Nimbus but it does not automate the Advantage on Saving Throws.

The Holy Nimbus activity includes a damage roll.

The Regain Use activity will consume a 5th level spell slot and restore a use of this feature.

Lay on Hands.name: 圣疗 Lay on Hands
Lay on Hands.description:
Your blessed touch can heal wounds. You have a pool of healing power that replenishes when you finish a Long Rest. With that pool, you can restore a total number of Hit Points equal to five times your Paladin level.

As a Bonus Action, you can touch a creature (which could be yourself) and draw power from the pool of healing to restore a number of Hit Points to that creature, up to the maximum amount remaining in the pool.

You can also expend 5 Hit Points from the pool of healing power to remove the Poisoned condition from the creature; those points don't also restore Hit Points to the creature.

Foundry Note

The Heal activity allows you to select the number of Hit Points you would like to restore and reduces your Lay on Hands pool by that amount.

The Remove Poison activity reduces your pool by 5 but does not automatically remove the Poisoned condition.

Oath of Devotion.name: 奉献之誓 Oath of Devotion
Oath of Devotion.description:
Uphold the Ideals of Justice and Order

The Oath of Devotion binds Paladins to the ideals of justice and order. These Paladins meet the archetype of the knight in shining armor. They hold themselves to the highest standards of conduct, and some—for better or worse—hold the rest of the world to the same standards.

Many who swear this oath are devoted to gods of law and good and use their gods' tenets as the measure of personal devotion. Others hold angels as their ideals and incorporate images of angelic wings into their helmets or coats of arms.

These paladins share the following tenets:

  • Let your word be your promise.
  • Protect the weak and never fear to act.
  • Let your honorable deeds be an example.

Paladin.name: 圣武士 Paladin
Paladin.description:
Core Paladin Traits

Primary Ability

Strength and Charisma

Hit Point Die

D10 per Paladin level

Saving Throw Proficiencies

Wisdom and Charisma

Skill Proficiencies

Choose 2: Athletics, Insight, Intimidation, Medicine, Persuasion, or Religion

Weapon Proficiencies

Simple and Martial weapons

Armor Training

Light, Medium, and Heavy armor and Shields

Starting Equipment

Choose A or B: (A) @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmChainMail0]{Chain Mail}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmShield0000]{Shield}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepLongsword0]{Longsword}, 6 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepJavelin000]{Javelins}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagHolySymbolV]{Holy Symbol}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagPriestsPack]{Priest's Pack}, and [[/award 9GP]]; or (B) [[/award 150GP]]

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbAppendixClass.JournalEntryPage.phbpdnPaladin000 inline classes="free-rules-embed"]

Becoming a Paladin …

As a Level 1 Character

  • Gain all the traits in the Core Paladin Traits table.
  • Gain the Paladin's level 1 features, which are listed in the Paladin Features table.

As a Multiclass Character

  • Gain the following traits from the Core Paladin Traits table: Hit Point Die, proficiency with Martial weapons, and training with Light and Medium armor and Shields.
  • Gain the Paladin's level 1 features, which are listed in the Paladin Features table. See the multiclassing rules in chapter 2 to determine your available spell slots.

Breaking Your Oath

A Paladin tries to hold to the highest standards of conduct, but even the most dedicated are fallible. Sometimes a Paladin transgresses their oath.

A Paladin who has broken a vow typically seeks absolution, spending an all-night vigil as a sign of penitence or undertaking a fast. After a rite of forgiveness, the Paladin starts fresh.

If your Paladin unrepentantly violates their oath, talk to your DM. Your Paladin should probably take a more appropriate subclass or even abandon the class and adopt another one.

Paladin's Smite.name: 圣武士斩技 Paladin's Smite
Paladin's Smite.description:
You always have the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDivineSmit]{Divine Smite} spell prepared. In addition, you can cast it without expending a spell slot, but you must finish a Long Rest before you can cast it in this way again.

Foundry Note

When you reach this level the Divine Smite spell is added to your spells as Always Prepared and with a free use.

Aura of Protection.name: 守护灵光 Aura of Protection
Aura of Protection.description:
不可视但具有保护性质的10尺灵光从你身上发散而出，该灵光在你&Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 时失效。

你与友方生物在你身边10尺内进行豁免检定时，可以将你的魅力调整值作为加值加在其豁免结果上（至少为 +1，现在为 [[lookup @abilities.cha.mod]]）。

一个生物只能同时收益于其中一个灵光效果，若有另一名圣武士在场，当他处于灵光重叠区域时，该生物需要选择接受来自哪位圣武士的灵光效果。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一个可自动提升豁免检定的激活效应，但该效应不应作用于其他受影响角色（因系统将错误调用受术角色的魅力调整值而非圣武士的调整值）。其他角色需手动添加圣武士的调整值。

Radiant Strikes.name: 光耀打击 Radiant Strikes
Radiant Strikes.description:
你的打击中携带着神圣的力量。当你使用近战武器或徒手打击命中一个生物时，该生物将额外受到 1d8 点光耀伤害。

Foundry Note

该特性包含可自动为所有近战武器攻击与徒手打击的伤害掷骰附加光耀伤害类型的激活效应。

Restoring Touch.name: 复原之触 Restoring Touch
Restoring Touch.description:
When you use Lay On Hands on a creature, you can also remove one or more of the following conditions from the creature: Blinded, Charmed, Deafened, Frightened, Paralyzed, or Stunned. You must expend 5 Hit Points from the healing pool of Lay On Hands for each of these conditions you remove; those points don't also restore Hit Points to the creature.

Foundry Note

This feature includes a Scale prompt for selecting how many conditions you would like to remove that will automatically consume the correct number from your Lay on Hands pool.

Sacred Weapon.name: 圣洁武器 Sacred Weapon
Sacred Weapon.description:
When you take the Attack action, you can expend one use of your Channel Divinity to imbue one Melee weapon that you are holding with positive energy. For 10 minutes or until you use this feature again, you add your Charisma modifier to attack rolls you make with that weapon (minimum bonus of +1), and each time you hit with it, you cause it to deal its normal damage type or Radiant damage.

The weapon also emits Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light 20 feet beyond that.

You can end this effect early (no action required). This effect also ends if you aren't carrying the weapon.

Smite of Protection.name: 卫护斩 Smite of Protection
Smite of Protection.description:
Your magical smite now radiates protective energy. Whenever you cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDivineSmit]{Divine Smite}, you and your allies have Half Cover while in your Aura of Protection. The aura has this benefit until the start of your next turn.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which provides the Half Cover status but it is not automatically granted as creatures enter/exit your aura.

phbpdnSpellcasti.name: 施法 phbpdnSpellcasti
phbpdnSpellcasti.description:
You have learned to cast spells through prayer and meditation. See the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.mh3akteBDiLegqFK]{rules on spellcasting}. The information below details how you use those rules with Paladin spells, which appear in the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.8yD9Jgp404hfZ9ie]{Paladin spell list}.

Spell Slots. The @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbPaladin000000.JournalEntryPage.A34CXe4HdzXHoBEl#class-features]{Paladin Features table} shows how many spell slots you have to cast your level 1+ spells. You regain all expended slots when you finish a Long Rest.

Prepared Spells of Level 1+. You prepare the list of level 1+ spells that are available for you to cast with this feature. To start, choose two level 1 Paladin spells. Heroism and Searing Smite are recommended.

The number of spells on your list increases as you gain Paladin levels, as shown in the Prepared Spells column of the Paladin Features table. Whenever that number increases, choose additional Paladin spells until the number of spells on your list matches the number in the Paladin Features table. The chosen spells must be of a level for which you have spell slots. For example, if you're a level 5 Paladin, your list of prepared spells can include six Paladin spells of level 1 or 2 in any combination.

If another Paladin feature gives you spells that you always have prepared, those spells don't count against the number of spells you can prepare with this feature, but those spells otherwise count as Paladin spells for you.

Changing Your Prepared Spells. Whenever you finish a Long Rest, you can replace one spell on your list with another Paladin spell for which you have spell slots.

Spellcasting Ability. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for your Paladin spells.

Spellcasting Focus. You can use a Holy Symbol as a Spellcasting Focus for your Paladin spells.

phbpdnWeaponMast.name: 武器精通 phbpdnWeaponMast
phbpdnWeaponMast.description:
你对武器的训练使你能够运用两种自选的你具有熟练的武器的精通词条，例如长剑和标枪。

每当你完成一次长休时，你可以改变你所选择的武器类型。比如你可以改为戟和链枷。

Cunning Action.name: 灵巧动作 Cunning Action
Cunning Action.description: 你精妙的反应与身手使你的行动无比迅速。你在战斗中每回合可执行一次附赠动作，该附赠动作可用以执行&Reference[Dash], &Reference[Disengage] 或 &Reference[Hide]三种动作项其中之一。

Cunning Strike.name: 诡诈打击 Cunning Strike
Cunning Strike.description:
You've developed cunning ways to use your Sneak Attack. When you deal Sneak Attack damage, you can add one of the following Cunning Strike effects. Each effect has a die cost, which is the number of Sneak Attack damage dice you must forgo to add the effect. You remove the die before rolling, and the effect occurs immediately after the attack's damage is dealt. For example, if you add the Poison effect, remove 1d6 from the Sneak Attack's damage before rolling.

If a Cunning Strike effect requires a saving throw, the DC equals 8 plus your Dexterity modifier and Proficiency Bonus.

Poison (Cost: 1d6). You add a toxin to your strike, forcing the target to make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target has the &Reference[Poisoned] condition for 1 minute. At the end of each of its turns, the Poisoned target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success.

To use this effect, you must have a Poisoner's Kit on your person.

Trip (Cost: 1d6). If the target is Large or smaller, it must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or have the &Reference[Prone] condition.

Withdraw (Cost: 1d6). Immediately after the attack, you move up to half your Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

Foundry Note

After using Cunning Strike effects use the Cunning Sneak Attack activity on this feature. It will prompt you to select how many dice you expended on effects and deduct them from your Sneak Attack roll automatically.

You can select the damage type in the damage roll dialog.

The Poison activity includes an Active Effect that applies the Poisoned condition.

The Trip activity includes an Active Effect that applies the Prone condition or you can use the inline condition above.

Trip.name: 摔绊
Trip.condition: 当你的偷袭攻击造成伤害时

Cunning Strike: Poisoned.name: 诡诈打击：淬毒
Cunning Strike: Poisoned.description: 你陷入中毒状态，持续 1 分钟。

Devious Strikes.name: 凶狡打击 Devious Strikes
Devious Strikes.description:
You've practiced new ways to use your Sneak Attack deviously. The following effects are now among your Cunning Strike options.

Daze (Cost: 2d6). The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw, or on its next turn, it can do only one of the following: move or take an action or a Bonus Action.

Knock Out (Cost: 6d6). The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw, or it has the &Reference[Unconscious] condition for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. The Unconscious target repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Obscure (Cost: 3d6). The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw, or it has the &Reference[Blinded] condition until the end of its next turn.

Foundry Note

After using Cunning Strike effects use the [[/item Cunning Strike activity=Cunning Sneak Attack]]{Cunning Sneak Attack} activity. It will prompt you to select how many dice you expended on effects and deduct them from your Sneak Attack roll automatically.

You can control the damage type in the damage roll dialog box.

The Daze activity includes an Active Effect for tracking the dazed target but it does not automate the effect.

The Knock Out activity includes an Active Effect which applies the Unconscious condition.

The Obscure activity includes an Active Effect which applies the Blinded condition.

Daze.name: 恍惚
Daze.condition: 当你的偷袭攻击造成伤害时

Knock Out.name: 击昏
Knock Out.condition: 当你的偷袭攻击造成伤害时

Obscure.name: 眩目
Obscure.condition: 当你的偷袭攻击造成伤害时

Devious Strikes: Dazed.name: 凶狡打击：恍惚
Devious Strikes: Dazed.description: 你的下一回合只能选择下列行为中的一项：移动、执行一个动作或执行一个附赠动作。

Devious Strikes: Knocked Out.name: 凶狡打击：击昏
Devious Strikes: Knocked Out.description: 你必须通过一个成功的体质豁免，否则将陷入昏迷状态，持续 1 分钟或受到任何伤害。昏迷的目标每在自己的回合结束时都可以重新进行豁免，若通过，则状态结束。

Devious Strikes: Blinded.name: 凶狡打击：炫目
Devious Strikes: Blinded.description: 陷入目盲状态，直到攻击者的下一回合结束。

Elusive.name: 飘忽不定 Elusive
Elusive.description: You're so evasive that attackers rarely gain the upper hand against you. No attack roll can have Advantage against you unless you have the Incapacitated condition.

phbrgeEpicBoon00.name: 传奇恩惠 phbrgeEpicBoon00
phbrgeEpicBoon00.description:
You gain an @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbFeats00000000.JournalEntryPage.GxfrwkJbrIvn7reC]{Epic Boon feat} or another feat of your choice for which you qualify. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.feats24.Item.phbBoonoftheNigh]{Boon of the Night Spirit} is recommended.

Foundry Note

You will be prompted for a choice while leveling up.

phbrgeEvasion000.name: 反射回避 phbrgeEvasion000
phbrgeEvasion000.description:
You can nimbly dodge out of the way of certain dangers. When you're subjected to an effect that allows you to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, you instead take no damage if you succeed on the saving throw and only half damage if you fail. You can't use this feature if you have the Incapacitated condition.

Foundry Note

With your token selected you can either right click on the damage roll's chat card and select  Apply Half Damage or click the "1/2" button and then the  Apply button.

phbrgeExpertise0.name: 专精 phbrgeExpertise0
phbrgeExpertise0.description:
你对手中武器足够理解。对于你拥有熟练项的武器，你可以任选其中两项并获得其精通属性，比如说匕首和短弓。

每当你完成长休后，你可以改变你所选的两把武器，比如说你可以改为获得弯刀和短剑的武器精通属性。

Foundry Note

当你升级时，系统会提示你选择你的专精方向。

Fast Hands.name: 快手 Fast Hands
Fast Hands.description:
As a Bonus Action, you can do one of the following.

Sleight of Hand. Make a Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check to pick a lock or disarm a trap with Thieves' Tools or to pick a pocket.

Use an Object. Take the Utilize action, or take the Magic action to use a magic item that requires that action.

Foundry Note

The Sleight of Hand and Thieves' Tools activities include the relevant checks.

The Use an Object activity can be used for tracking Bonus Action use.

Improved Cunning Strike.name: 进阶诡诈打击 Improved Cunning Strike
Improved Cunning Strike.description:
你在造成偷袭伤害时可以一次性选用两种诡诈打击效果，每种效果都需要独立扣除对应的偷袭伤害骰。

Foundry Note

使用诡诈打击效应后，系统将调用[[/item Cunning Strike activity=Cunning Sneak Attack]]{诡诈打击}行动。弹窗将提示你选择在效应中消耗的骰子数量，并自动从你的偷袭骰数中扣除。

你可在伤害骰对话框中选择控制伤害类型。

Reliable Talent.name: 可靠才能 Reliable Talent
Reliable Talent.description:
你自身技能经过精炼而更趋于完美。每当你进行的属性检定可以使用熟练加值时，你可以将 d20 骰中 9 或以下的结果都视为 10。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一个自动生效的激活效应，使你的技能与工具熟练项骰值保底为 10。

Rogue.name: 浪客 Rogue
Rogue.description:
Core Rogue Traits

Primary Ability

Dexterity

Hit Point Die

D8 per Rogue level

Saving Throw Proficiencies

Dexterity and Intelligence

Skill Proficiencies

Choose 4: Acrobatics, Athletics, Deception, Insight, Intimidation, Investigation, Perception, Persuasion, Sleight of Hand, or Stealth

Weapon Proficiencies

Simple weapons and Martial weapons that have the Finesse or Light property

Tool Proficiencies

Thieves' Tools

Armor Training

Light armor

Starting Equipment

Choose A or B: (A) @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmLeatherArm]{Leather Armor}, 2 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepDagger0000]{Daggers}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepShortsword]{Short­sword}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepShortbow00]{Shortbow}, 20 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbamoArrows0000]{Arrows}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagQuiver00000]{Quiver}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbtulThievesToo]{Thieves' Tools}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagBurglarsPac]{Burglar's Pack}, and [[/award 8GP]]; or (B) [[/award 100GP]]

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbAppendixClass.JournalEntryPage.phbrgeRogue00000 inline classes="free-rules-embed"]

Becoming a Rogue …

As a Level 1 Character

  • Gain all the traits in the Core Rogue Traits table.
  • Gain the Rogue's level 1 features, which are listed in the Rogue Features table.

As a Multiclass Character

  • Gain the following traits from the Core Rogue Traits table: Hit Point Die, proficiency in one skill of your choice from the Rogue's skill list, proficiency with Thieves' Tools, and training with Light armor.
  • Gain the Rogue's level 1 features, which are listed in the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbRogue00000000.JournalEntryPage.gJV8iDqdNhRMLi5r#class-features]{Rogue Features table}.

Expertise.title: 专精
Expertise.hint: 你获得两项由你选择的你已熟练的技能的专精。如果你有这两项技能的熟练的话，推荐选择巧手和隐匿。

Thieves' Cant.title: 盗贼黑话
Thieves' Cant.hint: 你在施展自己游荡者才华的社区里学习了多样的语言。你习得盗贼黑话和第二章的语言表中的一项语言。

FiaNLovfP6tnY4tD.hint: 你狡猾的头脑很难被人控制。你获得感知豁免与魅力豁免的熟练项。

Epic Boon.title: 传奇恩惠
Epic Boon.hint: You gain an Epic Boon feat or another feat of your choice for which you qualify. Boon of the Night Spirit is recommended.

Second-Story Work.name: 梁上君子 Second-Story Work
Second-Story Work.description:
You've trained to get into especially hard-to-reach places, granting you these benefits.

Climber. You gain a Climb Speed equal to your Speed.

Jumper. You can determine your &Reference[Jumping]{jump} distance using your Dexterity rather than your Strength.

Foundry Note

This feature does not automatically add the Climb Speed and will have to be added manually.

Slippery Mind.name: 圆滑心智 Slippery Mind
Slippery Mind.description:
你狡猾的头脑很难被人控制。你获得感知豁免与魅力豁免的熟练项。

Foundry Note

这些熟练项会随着等级提升自动赋予。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
You know how to strike subtly and exploit a foe's distraction. Once per turn, you can deal an extra 1d6 damage to one creature you hit with an attack roll if you have Advantage on the roll and the attack uses a Finesse or a Ranged weapon. The extra damage's type is the same as the weapon's type.

You don't need Advantage on the attack roll if at least one of your allies is within 5 feet of the target, the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition, and you don't have Disadvantage on the attack roll.

The extra damage increases as you gain Rogue levels, as shown in the Sneak Attack column of the Rogue Features table.

Current Sneak Attack Damage: [[lookup @scale.rogue.sneak-attack]]

Foundry Note

Your sneak attack damage will automatically scale as you level up. You can select the damage type in the damage roll's dialog box.

Steady Aim.name: 手稳就准 Steady Aim
Steady Aim.description: As a Bonus Action, you give yourself Advantage on your next attack roll on the current turn. You can use this feature only if you haven't moved during this turn, and after you use it, your Speed is 0 until the end of the current turn.

Stroke of Luck.name: 幸运一击 Stroke of Luck
Stroke of Luck.description:
You have a marvelous knack for succeeding when you need to. If you fail a D20 Test, you can turn the roll into a 20.

Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a Short or Long Rest.

Stroke of Luck.name: 幸运一击
Stroke of Luck.condition: 当你的 D20 检定失败时

Supreme Sneak.name: 极效潜行 Supreme Sneak
Supreme Sneak.description:
You gain the following Cunning Strike option.

Stealth Attack (Cost: 1d6). If you have the &Reference[Hide] action's Invisible condition, this attack doesn't end that condition on you if you end the turn behind &Reference[Three-Quarters Cover] or &Reference[Total Cover].

Thief.name: 盗贼 Thief
Thief.description:
追秘猎宝的经典冒险家

强盗、宝藏猎人、探险家，你是一切经典冒险者形象的缩影。这个子职不仅提高了你的灵活与隐匿技术，还为你提供了探索古老遗迹的游荡技巧，使你永远能够最大化利用藏匿其中的魔法物品。

Thief's Reflexes.name: 窃盗本能 Thief's Reflexes
Thief's Reflexes.description: 你变的更加擅长伏击和快速脱离险境。每次战斗的第一轮里，你可以行动两个回合。你先以自己正常的先攻执行你的第一个回合的行动，再以先攻数值减 10 的先攻执行你的第二个回合的行动。

Thieves' Cant.name: 盗贼黑话 Thieves' Cant
Thieves' Cant.description:
You picked up various languages in the communities where you plied your roguish talents. You know Thieves' Cant and one other language of your choice, which you choose from the language tables in @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbCreatingAChar.JournalEntryPage.t1WP9VEevo4TOTXw#choose-languages]{Character Creation}.

Foundry Note

Thieves' Cant will be added to your sheet automatically and you will be prompted to choose the additional language.

Uncanny Dodge.name: 直觉闪避 Uncanny Dodge
Uncanny Dodge.description:
When an attacker that you can see hits you with an attack roll, you can take a Reaction to halve the attack's damage against you (round down).

Foundry Note

With your token selected you can either right click on the damage roll's chat card and select  Apply Half Damage or click the "1/2" button and then the  Apply button.

Uncanny Dodge.name: 直觉闪避
Uncanny Dodge.condition: 当一个你能看见的敌人攻击命中你时

Use Magic Device.name: 使用魔法装置 Use Magic Device
Use Magic Device.description:
You've learned how to maximize use of magic items, granting you the following benefits.

Attunement. You can attune to up to four magic items at once.

Charges. Whenever you use a magic item property that expends charges, roll [[/r 1d6]]. On a roll of 6, you use the property without expending the charges.

Scrolls. You can use any Spell Scroll, using Intelligence as your spellcasting ability for the spell. If the spell is a cantrip or a level 1 spell, you can cast it reliably. If the scroll contains a higher-level spell, you must first succeed on an [[/skill arc]] check (DC 10 plus the spell's level). On a successful check, you cast the spell from the scroll. On a failed check, the scroll disintegrates.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect that automatically increases your attunement maximum.

When using an item property that expends charges roll the d6 and uncheck the consumption box to use it for free.

Attunement Bonus.name: 同调加值
Attunement Bonus.description: 你学会了如何最大限度地使用魔法物品，你可以同调至多四件魔法物品。

phbrgeWeaponMast.name: 武器精通 phbrgeWeaponMast
phbrgeWeaponMast.description:
你对手中武器足够理解。对于你拥有熟练项的武器，你可以任选其中两项并获得其精通属性，比如说匕首和短弓。

每当你完成长休后，你可以改变你所选的两把武器，比如说你可以改为获得弯刀和短剑的武器精通属性。

Defensive Tactics.name: 防守战术 Defensive Tactics
Defensive Tactics.description:
你选择并获得以下特性选项之一。当你完成一次短休或长休时，你可以将所选的选项替换为另一个。

冲出重围 以你为目标的借机攻击具有劣势。

多重防御 你被生物的攻击命中时，该生物在本回合内对你进行的所有后续攻击检定都具有劣势。

Foundry Note

此特性包含一个带有激活效应的多重防御行动，可用于跟进对你有劣势的生物，但不会自动应用该效应。

Multiattack Defense.name: 多重防御
Multiattack Defense.condition: 你被生物的攻击命中时

Deft Explorer.name: 熟练探险家 Deft Explorer
Deft Explorer.description:
得益于游历四方，你获得以下增益。

专精。 选择一项你熟练但不具备专精的技能。你在那个技能上获得专精。

语言。 你习得第二章中的语言表中的两种语言

Foundry Note

将游侠职业添加到角色卡时，系统会提示你进行选择。

phbrgrEpicBoon00.name: 传奇恩惠 phbrgrEpicBoon00
phbrgrEpicBoon00.description:
You gain an @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbFeats00000000.JournalEntryPage.GxfrwkJbrIvn7reC]{Epic Boon feat} or another feat of your choice for which you qualify. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.feats24.Item.phbBoonofDimensi]{Boon of Dimensional Travel} is recommended.

Foundry Note

You will be prompted for a choice while leveling up.

phbrgrExpertise0.name: 专精 phbrgrExpertise0
phbrgrExpertise0.description:
选择两项你熟练但不具备专精的技能，你获得这些技能的专精。

Foundry Note

当你升级时，系统会提示您做出选择。

phbrgrExtraAttac.name: Extra Attack phbrgrExtraAttac
phbrgrExtraAttac.description: You can attack twice instead of once whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

Favored Enemy.name: 宿敌 Favored Enemy
Favored Enemy.description:
You always have the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHuntersMar]{Hunter's Mark} spell prepared. You can cast it twice without expending a spell slot, and you regain all expended uses of this ability when you finish a Long Rest.

The number of times you can cast the spell without a spell slot increases when you reach certain Ranger levels, as shown in the Favored Enemy column of the Ranger Features table.

Foundry Note

The spell is granted to you at this level and will increase the number of free uses available automatically as you level up.

Feral Senses.name: 野性感官 Feral Senses
Feral Senses.description:
你与自然力量所链接，你获得 30 尺的盲视。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一项激活效应：若你未拥有盲视，可将盲视感应范围提升至30尺。

phbrgrFightingSt.name: 战斗风格 phbrgrFightingSt
phbrgrFightingSt.description:
You gain a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbFeats00000000.JournalEntryPage.sbHImaCB8ZMEHYkb]{Fighting Style feat} of your choice. Instead of choosing one of those feats, you can choose the option below.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.classes24.Item.phbfstDruidicWar caption=false]

Foe Slayer.name: 屠灭众敌 Foe Slayer
Foe Slayer.description:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHuntersMar]{Hunter's Mark} is a d10 rather than a d6.

Foundry Note

You may use this feature in place of the Bonus Mark Damage activity on the Hunter's Mark spell.

Hunter.name: 猎人 Hunter
Hunter.description:
保护自然与人民免于毁灭

你追逐猎物直到天涯海角，运用你的猎人的本领去保护自然与人民，使其不受灾祸的毁灭。

Hunter's Lore.name: 猎人学识 Hunter's Lore
Hunter's Lore.description: You can call on the forces of nature to reveal certain strengths and weaknesses of your prey. While a creature is marked by your Hunter's Mark, you know whether that creature has any Immunities, Resistances, or Vulnerabilities, and if the creature has any, you know what they are.

Hunter's Prey.name: 猎杀技艺 Hunter's Prey
Hunter's Prey.description:
You gain one of the following feature options of your choice. Whenever you finish a Short or Long Rest, you can replace the chosen option with the other one.

Colossus Slayer. Your tenacity can wear down even the most resilient foes. When you hit a creature with a weapon, the weapon deals an extra 1d8 damage to the target if it's missing any of its Hit Points. You can deal this extra damage only once per turn.

Horde Breaker. Once on each of your turns when you make an attack with a weapon, you can make another attack with the same weapon against a different creature that is within 5 feet of the original target, that is within the weapon's range, and that you haven't attacked this turn.

Foundry Note

This feature includes a Colossus Slayer activity for the additional damage. You can select the correct damage type in the roll dialog.

For the Horde Breaker option simply make another attack.

damage.condition: 每回合一次，当你用武器攻击命中一个生物时

Nature's Veil.name: 自然面纱 Nature's Veil
Nature's Veil.description:
你可以暂时地使用自然的力量将你的身形遮蔽。以一个附赠动作，你可以魔法地使自己变得隐形，直到你的下个回合开始。

你可以使用该特性的次数同等于你的感知调整值（至少为 1），完成一次长休后，你重获全部已消耗的使用次数。

Foundry Note

该特性包含施加隐形状态的激活效应。

Precise Hunter.name: 精准猎手 Precise Hunter
Precise Hunter.description: You have Advantage on attack rolls against the creature currently marked by your Hunter's Mark.

Ranger.name: 游侠 Ranger
Ranger.description:
Core Ranger Traits

Primary Ability

Dexterity and Wisdom

Hit Point Die

D10 per Ranger level

Saving Throw Proficiencies

Strength and Dexterity

Skill Proficiencies

Choose 3: Animal Handling, Athletics, Insight, Investigation, Nature, Perception, Stealth, or Survival

Weapon Proficiencies

Simple and Martial weapons

Armor Training

Light and Medium armor and Shields

Starting Equipment

Choose A or B: (A) @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmStuddedLea]{Studded Leather Armor}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepScimitar00]{Scimitar}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepShortsword]{Shortsword}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepLongbow000]{Longbow}, 20 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbamoArrows0000]{Arrows}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagQuiver00000]{Quiver}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagDruidicFocu]{Druidic Focus} (@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbdfcSprigofmis]{sprig of mistletoe}), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagExplorersPa]{Explorer's Pack}, and [[/award 7GP]]; or (B) [[/award 150GP]]

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbAppendixClass.JournalEntryPage.phbwzdWizard0000 inline classes="free-rules-embed"]

Becoming a Ranger …

As a Level 1 Character

  • Gain all the traits in the Core Ranger Traits table.
  • Gain the Ranger's level 1 features, which are listed in the Ranger Features table.

As a Multiclass Character

  • Gain the following traits from the Core Ranger Traits table: Hit Point Die, proficiency with Martial weapons, proficiency in one skill of your choice from the Ranger's skill list, and training with Light and Medium armor and Shields.
  • Gain the Ranger's level 1 features, which are listed in the Ranger Features table. See the multiclassing rules in chapter 2 to determine your available spell slots.

Relentless Hunter.name: 坚韧猎手 Relentless Hunter
Relentless Hunter.description: Taking damage can't break your Concentration on Hunter's Mark.

Roving.name: 越野 Roving
Roving.description:
Your Speed increases by 10 feet while you aren't wearing Heavy armor. You also have a Climb Speed and a Swim Speed equal to your Speed.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which increases your Speed by 10 feet. It does not automatically grant an equivalent Climb and Swim Speed though. It can be disabled if you choose to wear Heavy armor.

phbrgrSpellcasti.name: 施法 phbrgrSpellcasti
phbrgrSpellcasti.description:
You have learned to channel the magical essence of nature to cast spells. See the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.mh3akteBDiLegqFK]{rules on spellcasting}. The information below details how you use those rules with Ranger spells, which appear in the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.5HnIk6HsrSxkvkz5]{Ranger spell list}.

Spell Slots. The @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbRanger0000000.JournalEntryPage.fgzoeAJE4EEUSOYQ#class-features]{Ranger Features table} shows how many spell slots you have to cast your level 1+ spells. You regain all expended slots when you finish a Long Rest.

Prepared Spells of Level 1+. You prepare the list of level 1+ spells that are available for you to cast with this feature. To start, choose two level 1 Ranger spells. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCureWounds]{Cure Wounds} and @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplEnsnaringS]{Ensnaring Strike} are recommended.

The number of spells on your list increases as you gain Ranger levels, as shown in the Prepared Spells column of the Ranger Features table. Whenever that number increases, choose additional Ranger spells until the number of spells on your list matches the number in the Ranger Features table. The chosen spells must be of a level for which you have spell slots. For example, if you're a level 5 Ranger, your list of prepared spells can include six Ranger spells of level 1 or 2 in any combination.

If another Ranger feature gives you spells that you always have prepared, those spells don't count against the number of spells you can prepare with this feature, but those spells otherwise count as Ranger spells for you.

Changing Your Prepared Spells. Whenever you finish a Long Rest, you can replace one spell on your list with another Ranger spell for which you have spell slots.

Spellcasting Ability. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for your Ranger spells.

Spellcasting Focus. You can use a Druidic Focus as a Spellcasting Focus for your Ranger spells.

Superior Hunter's Defense.name: 高阶防守战术 Superior Hunter's Defense
Superior Hunter's Defense.description:
当你受到伤害时，你可以用你的反应使你获得对该伤害以及相同伤害类型的抗性, 直至当前回合结束。

Foundry Note

此特性包含一种针对每种伤害类型的抗性激活效应，可应用以获得相应的抗性。当你更改抗性时，请务必在你的角色卡的“效应”选项卡中禁用/删除之前的激活效应。

Superior Hunter's Prey.name: 高阶猎杀技艺 Superior Hunter's Prey
Superior Hunter's Prey.description:
Once per turn when you deal damage to a creature marked by your Hunter's Mark, you can also deal that spell's extra damage to a different creature that you can see within 30 feet of the first creature.

Foundry Note

You can apply the damage from Hunter's Mark or use the Damage activity on this feature.

Tireless.name: 不知疲倦 Tireless
Tireless.description:
自然远古力量助力你的旅程，你获得以下增益。

临时生命值。以一个魔法动作，你能够给予自己1d8+你的感知调整值的临时生命值（至少1点临时生命值）。你能够使用此特性的次数等于你的感知调整值，当你完成一次长休后，你恢复已消费的全部次数。

消除力竭。 每当你完成一次短休时，你的力竭等级（若有）减少1。

Foundry Note

临时生命值 行动将赋予临时生命值。

减少力竭 行动会降低你的力竭等级。

Decrease Exhaustion.name: 减少力竭
Decrease Exhaustion.condition: 每当你完成一次短休时

phbrgrWeaponMast.name: 武器精通 phbrgrWeaponMast
phbrgrWeaponMast.description:
对于你拥有熟练项的武器，你可以任选其中两项并获得其精通属性，比如说长弓和短剑。

每当你完成长休后，你可以改变你所选的两把武器，比如说你可以改为获得弯刀和长剑的武器精通属性。

Arcane Apotheosis.name: 奥术登神 Arcane Apotheosis
Arcane Apotheosis.description:
在你的先天术法特性处于激活状态期间，每个你的回合一次，你可以无需消耗术法点地使用一次超魔法选项。

Foundry Note

若需免费使用超魔法选项，请取消勾选对应的消耗选项。

Draconic Resilience.name: 龙族体魄 Draconic Resilience
Draconic Resilience.description:
The magic in your body manifests physical traits of your draconic gift. Your Hit Point maximum increases by 3, and it increases by 1 whenever you gain another Sorcerer level.

Parts of you are also covered by dragon-like scales. While you aren't wearing armor, your base Armor Class equals 10 plus your Dexterity and Charisma modifiers.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect that automatically increases your Hit Point maximum and sets up your Unarmored Defense which can be disabled if you would prefer to use armor.

Draconic Sorcery.name: 龙族术法 Draconic Sorcery
Draconic Sorcery.description:
Breathe the Magic of Dragons

Your innate magic comes from the gift of a dragon. Perhaps an ancient dragon facing death bequeathed some of its magical power to you or your ancestor. You might have absorbed magic from a site infused with dragons' power. Or perhaps you handled a treasure taken from a dragon's hoard that was steeped in draconic power. Or you might have a dragon for an ancestor.

Draconic Spells.title: 龙族法术
Draconic Spells.hint: 当你达到龙族法术表中所示的术士等级时，你将同时获得其对应的龙族法术。龙族法术一旦获得，将会一直在你的准备法术列表中。
